lines.text:
[praying for her lover who is about to go on a duel with her husband]
Save him, dear saint. You know that we were guilty in thought only. And what are thoughts? Will you save him, my dear saint? I thank you in advance. Blessed be your name in heaven as on earth. Amen.
Unhappiness is our own invention. At times I'm sad that I lack the imagination for it.
I don't love you, I don't love you...

[Remy shows a pair of earrings]
What's that?
I couldn't believe she'd sell them without your knowledge.
I thought that by buying them...
What are you saying, Monsieur Remy?
I thought I was doing both of you a favor.
I don't follow, Monsieur Remy. I sometimes do favors for others but I avoid letting others do them for me.
